title: How We Made: Banana Nut Muffins
summary: Margaret Chen (Recipe Development): Margaret measured ingredients twice | Julian Torres (Photography): Julian explained his artistic vision for 15 minutes | Marcus Reid (Editorial Copy): Marcus used 'whom' twice
full_story:
# How We Made This Recipe


## Margaret Chen - Recipe Development

- Margaret measured ingredients twice
- Muttered about proper technique
- Emotional state: professionally focused

## Julian Torres - Photography

- Julian explained his artistic vision for 15 minutes
- Wore all black to the shoot
- Adjusted lighting 12 times
- Muttered about 'commercial constraints'

## Marcus Reid - Editorial Copy

- Marcus used 'whom' twice
- Referenced his thesis research
- Brought Moleskine to typing session
- Checked thesaurus 7 times

## Stephanie 'Steph' Whitmore - Creative Review

- Rewrote feedback 3 times before delivering
- Checked Slack 12 times while reviewing
- Bought team coffee to soften any criticism

## Devon Park - Deployment

- Devon showed up 20 minutes late
- Deployment was done before he arrived (automation)
- Responded to Slack 4 hours later

key_decisions: Considered structural integrity in muffin tin format
Created: Cinnamon Swirl Banana Nut Muffin Bites
Took 54 shots to capture the essence
